snippet: Many Mets fans attended a blood drive at Citi Field where all donors were given a voucher for two free tickets to any home game this April.
lead_paragraph: Many Mets fans attended a blood drive at Citi Field where all donors were given a voucher for two free tickets to any home game this April.

headline.seo: Loyalty, Pessimism and Altruism at Mets’ Blood Drive
headline.main: Loyalty, Pessimism and Altruism at Mets’ Blood Drive
headline.print_headline: Loyalty, Pessimism and Altruism at Mets’ Blood Drive
